message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?
I'll give you a smaller share this time, but I'll make it a better deal eventually.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share. Let's split it 80/20 this time. We can work towards a more even split later.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up yet. This is my best offer so far.
